name: EGSA Pretty Jukebox
description: Custom Juqster interface to be used on EGSA's channels. Random channel: http://www.juqster.com/hub.html?id=-egsa-random Anime channel: http://www.juqster.com/hub.html?id=-egsa-anime Github repo: https://github.com/Deku/EGSA-Pretty-Jukebox Important: To change between themes you have to reinstall the style
additional_info:
v0.7:
- Introduced themes! You have to reinstall the style to change between light and dark

v0.6:
- Simplified the previous version of the jukebox
- Resized the online users

v0.5:
- Fixed text color in messages
- Fixed song name in the message info
- Fixed hub's info sizing when description is hidden
- Corrected color of favorite button when not active
- Redesigned jukebox

v0.4:
- Redesigned the chat box
- Fixed the description box in the hub info

v0.3:
- Resized hub's info
- Added some order to the CSS file
- Changed the color of the "Edit hub" button

v0.2:
- Compressed a little the playlist items
- Added current version next to Juqster's logo

v0.1: Initial style.
- Fixed the position of the logo
- Removed useless scrollbar in the middle column
- Fixed hidden scrollbar in the jukebox container
- Redesigned the player
- Made the participants' avatars smaller

style_setting_options.label: Light
Dark
